channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish is being left by a wheelie bin, 16th September
item.description:
A wheelie bin has been moved outside The ArtsXchange College at 263-269 City Road, and it is encouraging local traders to dump their unwanted rubbish there, causing a H&S hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 263-269, City Road, Islington, London
Report on FixMyStreet
